div.div: Location of bycatch survey project and stations.
div.p: The bycatch survey stations (inset) covered scallop access areas in Closed Area I and Closed Area II. The designated boundaries of current Essential Fish Habitats for adult (light gray) and juvenile (hatched) monkfish are also shown (GIS shapefiles from http://www.nmfs.noaa.gov/sfa/hms/documents/fmp/am1/shapefiles.html).
